Container.Name: Transmission_VPN
Container.Overview:
Docker container which runs Transmission torrent client with WebUI while connecting to OpenVPN.[br] When using PIA as provider it will update Transmission hourly with assigned open port. Please read the instructions below."[br][br] You must set the environment variables OPENVPN_PROVIDER, OPENVPN_USERNAME and OPENVPN_PASSWORD to provide basic connection details.[br][br] Required environment options[br] Variable Function Example[br][br] [b]OPENVPN_PROVIDER[/b] Sets the OpenVPN provider to use. OPENVPN_PROVIDER=provider. All Providers are listed in the Drop Down[br] [b]OPENVPN_USERNAME[/b][br] Your OpenVPN username OPENVPN_USERNAME=asdf[br][br] [b]OPENVPN_PASSWORD[/b][br] Your OpenVPN password OPENVPN_PASSWORD=asdf[br][br]
Network configuration options[br] Variable Function Example[br] [b]OPENVPN_CONFIG[/b] Sets the OpenVPN endpoint to connect to. OPENVPN_CONFIG=UK Southampton[br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']The container is Currently set up for PIA Endpoints. Please change the Default Variable in OPENVPN_CONFIG to the Variables listed in the appropriate folders for whatever VPN you are using here: https://github.com/haugene/docker-transmission-openvpn/tree/master/openvpn [/span][/b][br][br]
[b]OPENVPN_OPTS[/b] Will be passed to OpenVPN on startup See OpenVPN doc[br] [b]LOCAL_NETWORK[/b] Sets the local network that should have access. LOCAL_NETWORK=192.168.0.0/24[br]
Firewall configuration options[br][br] When enabled, the firewall blocks everything except traffic to the peer port and traffic to the rpc port from the LOCAL_NETWORK and the internal docker gateway.[br][br]
If TRANSMISSION_PEER_PORT_RANDOM_ON_START is enabled then it allows traffic to the range of peer ports defined by TRANSMISSION_PEER_PORT_RANDOM_HIGH and TRANSMISSION_PEER_PORT_RANDOM_LOW.[br][br]
Transmission configuration options[br] You may override transmission options by setting the appropriate environment variable .[br] optional Variables listed here: https://github.com/haugene/docker-transmission-openvpn/blob/master/transmission/environment-variables.tmpl[br][br] EXAMPLE:[br][br] Transmission variable name: [b]speed-limit-up[/b][br] Environment variable name: [b]TRANSMISSION_SPEED_LIMIT_UP[/b][br] As you can see the variables are prefixed with TRANSMISSION_, the variable is capitalized, and - is converted to _.
